statements.select: select a.*,b.Name as AddPersonName,c.Name as DisciplineName
statements.sql:
from w_questionstore a left join h_station_account b on a.AddPerson = b.Account_ID left join w_discipline c on a.Discipline_ID = c.ID where a.IsDelete = 0 and a.system_station_id = #stationId#
a.Name like concat('%',#name#,'%')
a.Valid=#valid#
a.Discipline_ID in (SELECT ID FROM w_discipline WHERE FIND_IN_SET(ID,GetChildList(#disciplineId#,'w_discipline')))
order by a.Valid desc, a.ID desc
limit #pageIndex#, #pageSize#
statements.update: update w_questiondata set Content = #content# where ID = #id#

update w_question set DoCount = DoCount + 1
,EasyWrongAnswer = #EasyWrongAnswer#
,CorrectCount = CorrectCount + 1
where ID = #ID#
statements.delete: delete from w_questiondata where ID = #id#; delete from w_question where QuestionData_ID = #id#;
statements.select: select a.*,b.Name as AddPersonName,c.Name as QuestionStoreName, d.Name as QuestionTypeName from w_question a left join h_station_account b on a.AddPerson = b.Account_ID left join w_questionstore c on a.QuestionStore_ID = c.ID left join w_questiontype d on a.QuestionType_ID = d.ID where a.ID = #id#

select a.*,b.Name as AddPersonName,c.Name as QuestionStoreName, d.Name as QuestionTypeName, (select Content from w_questiondata where ID = a.QuestionData_ID) Content from w_question a left join h_station_account b on a.AddPerson = b.Account_ID left join w_questionstore c on a.QuestionStore_ID = c.ID left join w_questiontype d on a.QuestionType_ID = d.ID where a.QuestionData_ID = (select QuestionData_ID from w_question where ID = #id#)
select a.*,b.Name as QuestionTypeName from w_question a left join w_questiontype b on a.QuestionType_ID = b.ID where a.QuestionData_ID = #id# order by a.sort
select a.*,b.Name as AddPersonName,c.Name as QuestionStoreName, (case when a.QuestionData_ID > 0 then "组合题" else d.Name end) as QuestionTypeName
statements.sql:
from w_question a left join h_station_account b on a.AddPerson = b.Account_ID left join w_questionstore c on a.QuestionStore_ID = c.ID left join w_questiontype d on a.QuestionType_ID = d.ID where a.system_station_id = #stationId#
a.Title like concat('%',#title#,'%')
a.QuestionType_ID=#type# and a.QuestionData_ID = 0
a.QuestionData_ID > 0
a.QuestionStore_ID=#store#
a.Level=#level#
order by a.ID desc
limit #pageIndex#, #pageSize#
statements.select:
select * from w_questionnote
`StuID`=#StuID#
`Question_ID`=#Question_ID#
order by AddTime desc
select (select count(1) from w_chapter_question where Question_ID = #id#) + (select count(1) from w_exampaperdetail_detail where Question_ID = #id#) as count
SELECT e.*,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM w_questionerrorcorrection where Question_ID = e.Question_ID and Valid = 0) as Counts,t.`Name` as StoreName,p.`Name` as TypeName,q.Title,s.`Name` as StudentName
statements.sql:
from w_questionerrorcorrection e LEFT JOIN w_question q on e.Question_ID=q.ID LEFT JOIN s_studentinfo s on e.StuID=s.StuID LEFT JOIN w_questionstore t on q.QuestionStore_ID=t.ID LEFT JOIN w_questiontype p on p.ID=q.QuestionType_ID where 1=1 and t.System_Station_ID=#System_Station_ID#
e.Valid=#Valid#
q.Title like concat('%',#Title#,'%')
ORDER BY e.Valid ASC ,e.AddTime desc
limit #pageIndex#, #pageSize#
statements.update: UPDATE w_questionerrorcorrection SET Valid=1 where Question_ID = #ID#
statements.select: SELECT e.*,t.`Name` as StoreName,p.`Name` as TypeName,q.Title,s.`Name` as StudentName from w_questionerrorcorrection e LEFT JOIN w_question q on e.Question_ID=q.ID LEFT JOIN s_studentinfo s on e.StuID=s.StuID LEFT JOIN w_questionstore t on q.QuestionStore_ID=t.ID LEFT JOIN w_questiontype p on p.ID=q.QuestionType_ID where e.Valid=0 and e.Question_ID=#ID#

select * from w_questionstore where ID in ( select(case when a.BusType = 1 then b.QuestionStore_ID else c.QuestionStore_ID end) as QuestionStore_ID from w_doexamresult a left JOIN w_chapterpractice b on a.BusID = b.ID and a.BusType = 1 left join w_exampaper c on a.BusID = c.ID and a.BusType = 0 where a.StuID = #StuId# union select QuestionStore_ID from w_question where ID in( SELECT BusID from w_collection where StuID = #StuId# and BusType = 0 ) union SELECT QuestionStore_ID from w_question where ID in(SELECT Question_ID from w_questionnote where StuID = #StuId# and IsDelete = 0) ) and Valid = 1 and System_Station_ID = #System_Station_ID#
